create_a_tag_desc: Tags categorize tickets, making it easy to identify issues
invalid_tag_name_text: Please enter a valid tag name. Tag name must contain at least 3 characters.
create_ticket_type_desc: Create a ticket type to categorize tickets
invalid_type_name_text: Please enter a valid type name. Type name must contain at least 3 characters.
invalid_ticket_subject_text: Please enter a valid Subject. Subject must contain at least {{minSubjectLength}} characters.
invalid_ticket_issue_text: Please enter a valid Issue. Issue must contain at least {{minIssueLength}} characters.
invalid_comment_text: Please enter a valid comment. Comment must contain at least 5 characters.
invalid_note_text: Please enter a valid note. Notes must contain at least 5 characters.
ticket_issue_desc: Please try to be as specific as possible. Please include any details you think may be relevant, such as troubleshooting steps you've taken.
remove_priority_desc: Please select the priority you wish to reassign tickets to in order to delete the this priority.
This_will_change_all_tickets_with_a_prio: This will change all tickets with a priority of
remove_ticket_type_desc: Please select the ticket type you wish to reassign tickets to in order to delete the ticket type.
This_will_change_all_tickets_with_type: This will change all tickets with type
to_the_selected_ticket_type_above: to the selected ticket type above
